attributes.action: Keep Spring Awakening open and spread the word to as many people as possible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new musical 'Spring Awakening' has just transfered from Broadway but has unfortunatley announced it's closure on the 30th of May. This show focuses upon a stage of life to be, being, or experienced by every single person, and should be seen by as many people as possible to get more people into true theatre [opposed to jukebox musicals] Please sign this petition if you agree in keeping this amazing show open and save the jobs of the talented people who perform in the show...

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
